page.title: 11Female employment
page.content:
There are 49 females living in Stackpole who have left school. Their occupations are as follows: Housewives........................34 Canteen cooks......................4 Merrion Army Camp (cleaners etc)...3 Farm worker........................1 Office workers.....................2 Restaurant owner...................1 School dinner lady.................1 Midwife............................1 Nursery school assistant...........1 School cleaner.....................1
Some of the housewives mentioned are old age pensioners.
